channel.title: The Morning Ride
channel.description: Like it or not, technology is all around us, at home, at work, and at play, either way offerings are presenting themselves everyday, much like drinking from a firehose, its almost impossible to determine what is worthy from worthless. This program will attempt to seperate the cool from the crisco... Made by ESC Merchant Services
channel.itunes:subtitle: Like it or not, technology is all around us, at home, at work, and at play, either way offerings are presenting themselves everyday, much like drinking from a firehose, its almost impossible to determine what is worthy from worthless. This program will attempt to seperate the cool from the crisco... Made with Cast Easy http://www.casteasy.com
channel.itunes:summary: A Clearinghouse of Business Technology With years in the making, ESC submits the following PodCast Program, The Morning Ride. We hope you find the information useful. So swing on iTunes when you get a chance and subscribe to "The Morning Ride" and get the latest perspectives on what technology is real and what is just magic. If you find that a particular topic should be addressed, or you would like an addition made to our list, please forward any additions/changes to TMR@1esc.com Check Out the New 2007 Video Games Buyer's Guide You have certainly heard, "You pass by more opportunities when driving to work than you will ever encounter in your day at the office. This program is dedicated to making sure these opportunities don't pass you by....
channel.itunes:author: Rick W. Ricker

item.title: Website Security, You Deserve a Breach Today
item.description: A Humorous Approach To Keeping Abreast of Security by Authentication
item.author: Rick W. Ricker, ESC, Inc. Architecture & Strategy
item.itunes:subtitle: A Humorous Approach To Keeping Abreast of Security by Authentication
item.itunes:summary: Recently, Security Authentication migrated from luxury to law. With that, what do organizations do to comply without breaking the bank or incurring a violation or a breach in security costing millions. This walks you through the choices while interjecting some humor along the way...
item.itunes:author: Rick W. Ricker, ESC, Inc. Architecture & Strategy

item.title: 2006 Video Games Buyer' Guide
item.description: 2006 Video Games Buyer's Guide: Save Time & Money - Let the Morning Ride sort out what is worth giving or getting in the Video Game world.
item.author: Rick W. Ricker, ESC, Inc. Architecture & Strategy
item.itunes:subtitle: 2006 Video Games Buyer's Guide: Save Time & Money - Let the Morning Ride sort out what is worth giving or getting in the Video Game world.
item.itunes:summary: 2006 Video Games Buyer's Guide - Graded on several levels with a cumulative GPA - find out if what games make the grade, and what games failed to show up in class...
item.itunes:author: Rick W. Ricker, ESC, Inc. Architecture & Strategy

item.title: The Merchants Guide to Credit Card Processing
item.description: If you're a business owner - This is a MUST know - It not only explains the ins and outs, but supplies secrets to saving you from being skinned alive out there!
item.author: Rick W. Ricker, ESC, Inc. Architecture & Strategy
item.itunes:subtitle: If you're a business owner - This is a MUST know - It not only explains the ins and outs, but supplies secrets to saving you from being skinned alive out there!
item.itunes:summary: Like payroll, or utilities, Credit Card Processing has become a necessary evil to do business; however, unlike these other costs, the complexity of the credit card industry has shot up orders of magnitude. This show is dedicated to clearing that up.
item.itunes:author: Rick W. Ricker, ESC, Inc. Architecture & Strategy
item.itunes:keywords: Credit Card Processing Merchant Services Secrets VISA Mastercard AMEX Diners Club
